meta.name: TrailWatch
meta.about: HK hiking app📱 Keep a full record of journeys and protect our countryside by reporting incidents🌳

meta.name: Trailwatch
meta.about:
‧ 建立資訊網絡平台, 讓公眾參與和監察郊野的保育 
‧ 讓使用者記錄行山及郊野活動，與其他使用者分享見聞記事，從而積極參與監察郊野的工作
‧ Encouraging the public to monitor and conserve Hong Kong's country parks
‧ To protect and better manage one of Hong Kong's most valuable assets – its country parks.

Download TrailWatch：
iOS版本： https://appsto.re/hk/5yZjV.i
Android版本 ： http://goo.gl/vv5Q6m

Enjoy . Share . Protect : https://www.trailwatch.hk
